FieldType.description:
The field type. The value is as follows:

- **String**: String.
- **Long**: Long integer.
- **Integer**: Integer.
- **Double**: Floating-point type.
- **Boolean**: Boolean.
- **ip**: The IP entity.
- **file**: file entity.
- **process**: process entity.
- **incident**: event entity.
- **alert**: alert entity.
- **host**: host entity.
- **domain**: The domain name entity.
- **container**: container entity.

Required.description:
Is the field mandatory? Possible values are:

- **true**: Required.
- **false**: Optional.

Arrayed.description:
Is the field arrayed? Possible values are:

- true: Arrayed.
- false: Not Arrayed.

FieldClass.description:
Field types, with the following values:

- **normal**: Normal type.
- **custom**: Complex type; in this mode, FieldConfigs can be configured.

FieldConfigs.description: Supports configuring nested input parameters in complex-type scenarios.

The user ID for the administrator to switch to another member's perspective.
The UUID of the playbook.

The version type of the playbook, with the following values:

- **Draft**: Editing state.
- **Online**: Online version.
- **History**: Historical version.
The version ID of the playbook, which is only effective when **PlaybookVersionType** is **History**.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

RequestId.description: The ID of this request, a unique identifier generated by Alibaba Cloud for the request, which can be used for troubleshooting and problem localization.

PlaybookName.description: Name of the playbook, without special characters.

PlaybookParamType.description:
Parameter type of the playbook, with the following values:

- **template-ip**: IP entity.
- **template-file**: File entity.
- **template-process**: Process entity.
- **template-host**: Host entity.
- **template-domain**: Domain entity.
- **template-container**: Container entity.
- **template-incident**: Security incident.
- **template-alert**: Security alert.
- **custom**: Custom.

PlaybookStatus.description:
Publication status of the playbook, with the following values:

- **0**: Unpublished.
- **1**: Published.

PlaybookInputConfigs.description: List of playbook input parameter configurations.

PlaybookOutputConfigs.description: List of playbook output parameter configurations.

PlaybookType.title: 剧本类型
PlaybookType.description:
Type of the playbook, with values as follows:

- **preset**: Predefined playbook.
- **user**: Custom playbook.
- **component**: Security response component.

GetPlaybook.title: Get Playbook Details

schema.description:
Language type for request and response messages.
- **zh** (default): Chinese
- **en**: English
User ID for the administrator to switch to another member's perspective.
Page number for pagination, default value is 1.
Number of items per page for pagination. Range: 1~100.
Maximum number of results returned in a single request. Range: 1~100.
Token for the next query start.

Publication status of the playbook, with values as follows:

- **0**: Unpublished.
- **1**: Published.
Collection of UUIDs of playbooks.
Name of the playbook, supports fuzzy search.
Collection of input parameter types for the playbook.

items.description:
Parameter types for the playbook, with values as follows:

- **template-ip**: IP entity.
- **template-file**: File entity.
- **template-process**: Process entity.
- **template-host**: Host entity.
- **template-domain**: Domain entity.
- **template-container**: Container entity.
- **template-incident**: Security incident.
- **template-alert**: Security alert.
- **custom**: Custom.

schema.description: Start time of the latest execution of the playbook.
End time of the latest execution of the playbook.

Sorting field. Values:

- **UpdateTime**: Sort by update time.
- **ExecutionTime**: Sort by the latest execution time.

Sorting logic, default is **desc**, with values as follows:
- **desc**: Descending order.
- **asc**: Ascending order.

Type of the playbook, with values as follows:

- **preset**: Predefined playbook.
- **user**: Custom playbook.
- **component**: Security response component.
